articles.title: Officer killed responding to shooting at Atlanta CDC identified
articles.description: David Rose, 33, was shot to death in a confrontation with a gunman near the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention headquarters in Atlanta. The gunman was later found dead in a nearby building.

articles.title: Trump plans to meet Putin on Ukraine; reportedly orders military to target drug cartels
articles.description: President Trump is planning to meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin in Alaska to discuss ending the war in Ukraine. Separately, reports indicate Trump has ordered the military to target drug cartels.

articles.title: Three people injured in shooting at Times Square
articles.description: Three people were injured in a shooting in Times Square, New York City, early Saturday morning. The suspect has been taken into custody.
